events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago but my package still hasn't arrived and the tracking information hasn't been updated for days.
The issue has been categorized under Delivery Delay based on the customer's message mentioning late shipment and tracking problems.
An agent specialized in shipping issues has been assigned to assist the customer with their delayed delivery.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m sorry to hear your package hasn’t arrived yet. I’ll do my best to help you today.
Could you please provide me with your order number or the tracking number so I can check the current status for you?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and the tracking code is ZX987654321. I haven’t seen any status updates since last week.
Thank you for the details. I have contacted the shipping carrier and they confirmed there is a delay due to weather. We expect your package to be delivered within 3 more days.
Alright, thank you for the update. I hope it arrives soon, I was just getting worried because the tracking stopped updating.
Glad I could assist you. We will keep monitoring your shipment and notify you if anything changes. Please reach out if you need further help.
Just following up to check if your package has arrived as expected. Please let us know if you are still experiencing any issues.
Yes, the package arrived this morning. Everything is in good condition, thank you for the support!
We’re happy to hear your order arrived safely. Closing this case now, but feel free to contact us anytime for assistance.
